Operation 'post-/marketing/v3/campaigns/{campaignGuid}/budget' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. The current description is minimal and lacks critical details. It doesn't specify what the operation returns, the input schema requirements, or side effects on campaign budget tracking. Enhanced description clarifies the request/response schemas, HTTP status code, and impact on campaign state for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Add a new budget item to the campaign
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new budget item for the specified campaign. Accepts budget allocation details via PublicBudgetItemInput. Returns the created budget item with a 201 status code. This operation updates the campaign's budget allocation and may affect campaign spend tracking.
data.reasoning: The current description is minimal and lacks critical details. It doesn't specify what the operation returns, the input schema requirements, or side effects on campaign budget tracking. Enhanced description clarifies the request/response schemas, HTTP status code, and impact on campaign state for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'post-/marketing/v3/campaigns/{campaignGuid}/spend' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. The current description is overly brief and lacks essential details about inputs, outputs, and operational effects. Enhanced description specifies the input schema (PublicSpendItemInput), HTTP response code, return value, and side effects on campaign spend tracking. This enables AI agents to better understand when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Create a new campaign spend item
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new campaign spend item for the specified campaign. Accepts spend details via PublicSpendItemInput. Returns the created spend item with a 201 status code. This operation records campaign expenditure and updates spend tracking metrics.
data.reasoning: The current description is overly brief and lacks essential details about inputs, outputs, and operational effects. Enhanced description specifies the input schema (PublicSpendItemInput), HTTP response code, return value, and side effects on campaign spend tracking. This enables AI agents to better understand when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'put-/marketing/v3/campaigns/{campaignGuid}/spend/{spendId}' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description lacks details about what input is expected (PublicSpendItemInput), what is returned (PublicSpendItem), and the side effect of modifying campaign spend tracking. Added these details for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Update a specific campaign spend item by ID
data.description_suggestion: Updates a specific campaign spend item by ID. Accepts PublicSpendItemInput with spend details. Returns the updated PublicSpendItem object. Modifies the spend tracking for the specified campaign.
data.reasoning: Description lacks details about what input is expected (PublicSpendItemInput), what is returned (PublicSpendItem), and the side effect of modifying campaign spend tracking. Added these details for better AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'delete-/marketing/v3/campaigns/{campaignGuid}/spend/{spendId}' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description is missing information about what happens after deletion (permanent removal) and the irreversible nature of the operation. AI agents need to understand the consequences before executing delete operations.

data.current_description: Delete a specific campaign spend item by ID
data.description_suggestion: Deletes a specific campaign spend item by ID. Permanently removes the spend record from the campaign. This action cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Description is missing information about what happens after deletion (permanent removal) and the irreversible nature of the operation. AI agents need to understand the consequences before executing delete operations.

message: Operation 'get-/marketing/v3/campaigns/{campaignGuid}/budget/{budgetId}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context. Original summary 'Get budget item' is too generic and lacks campaign context. Description is vague about what type of budget item and what information is returned. data.current_description:
This endpoint deletes a batch of campaigns. 
The maximum number of items in a batch request is 50.
The response will always be 204 No Content, regardless of whether the campaigns exist or not, whether they were successfully deleted or not, or if only some of the campaigns in the batch were deleted.
data.description_suggestion: Archives a batch of campaigns. The maximum number of items in a batch request is 50. Returns 204 No Content regardless of whether the campaigns exist, were successfully archived, or if only some campaigns in the batch were archived. This operation is idempotent and does not fail if campaigns are not found.

data.current_description:
Perform a partial update of a campaign identified by the specified campaignGuid. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will cause 400 error.
If an empty string is passed for any property in the Batch Update, it will reset that property's value.

Returns the updated campaign object with all current properties.

data.current_description:
This endpoint reads a batch of campaigns based on the provided input data and returns the campaigns along with their associated assets. 
 The maximum number of items in a batch request is 50.
The campaigns in the response are not guaranteed to be in the same order as they were provided in the request.
If duplicate campaign IDs are provided in the request, duplicates will be ignored. The response will include only unique IDs and will be returned without duplicates.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a batch of campaigns with their associated assets. Accepts up to 50 campaign IDs per request. Returns campaign objects with linked assets (Forms, Static lists, External website pages). Response order is not guaranteed to match request order. Duplicate campaign IDs in the request are automatically deduplicated in the response.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity on input format and expected response structure. Added explicit mention of what input is expected, what is returned, and clarified the deduplication behavior. Improved consistency with Campaign Asset terminology for better AI agent understanding.
